title: Authorizes the city of New York to reconvey a parcel of land to the estate of Hilda Spivak
summary: Authorizes the city of New York to reconvey a parcel of land to the estate of Hilda Spivak.
actClause: AN ACT authorizing the city of New York to reconvey its interest in certain real property acquired by in rem tax foreclosure in the borough of Staten Island to the estate of former owner Hilda Spivak, notwithstanding expiration of the two year period within which application may be made to the city to release its interest in property thus acquired; Block No. 1124, Lot No. 19 on tax map for the borough of Staten Island
